page.title: 20MOVING SCHOOL
page.content:
{[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]
At the{Down School,}fourth year children are getting ready to go to their Secondary School at the{Endowed} {Comprehensive School}in Bridgnorth, which was once the Grammar school.
Everyone there has a tie for Rowley, Hardwick or Washbrook Houses. Some time ago, Mr. James, Head of Lower School came to visit us, and then a few weeks later the fourth year visited the Endowed School for the day to see what it was like. Our parents went last week to see the school, and to find out our tutorial groups, and to ask questions.
We feel excited, but a bit nervous and uncertain. {[][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][][]
